definitions.definition: To dress (flax or hemp) with a hackle; to prepare fibres of flax or hemp for spinning.
To separate , as the coarse part of flax or hemp from the fine, by drawing it through the teeth of a hackle or hatchel.
To tear asunder ; to break into pieces.

main_definition: To dress (flax or hemp) with a hackle; to prepare fibres of flax or hemp for spinning. [from 17th c.]
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To separate , as the coarse part of flax or hemp from the fine, by drawing it through the teeth of a hackle or hatchel.
( archaic , transitive ) To tear asunder ; to break into pieces.
